title: P&G Logo
content:
Hand drawn or font? Can anyone help?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [94\_P&G\_501.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130630065456/http:/typophile.com/files/94_P&G_501.jpg) | 7.88 KB |
author: acejet170

comments.content:
I too would be interested to see which company produced the full Proctor & Gamble logo. It really is the worst, most amateurish (not intentionally) piece of crap for a major corporation ever.

Nick Cooke
